rules.selector:
/* ===========================================
    SISTEMA DE DISEO - EXTENSIONES
   Variables espec铆ficas de popup que extienden design-system.css
   =========================================== */
:root

/* Skeleton container para estados de carga */
.skeleton-container

/* ESTILOS PARA PESTAAS DE BANCOS - .banks-tabs usado */
.banks-tabs

/* ==========================================
   SISTEMA UNIFICADO DE CARDS (v8.0)
   Base com煤n para route-card y crypto-route-card
   ========================================== */

.route-card,
.crypto-route-card,
.arbitrage-card

rules.declarations:
border-left-color: var(--color-success);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.05), transparent);

border-left-color: var(--color-danger);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.03), transparent);

rules.selector:
/* Footer de la tarjeta fiat (igual que crypto) */
.route-card .fiat-card-footer

/* Estilos del modal fiat (reutiliza estilos crypto) */
.fiat-details-modal

rules.declarations:
background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(63, 185, 80, 0.1) 0%, var(--color-bg-tertiary) 100%);
  border-color: rgba(63, 185, 80, 0.3);

background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(248, 81, 73, 0.1) 0%, var(--color-bg-tertiary) 100%);
  border-color: rgba(248, 81, 73, 0.3);

rules.selector:
/* Badges debajo del exchange, lado izquierdo */
.route-badges

/* Route Steps - Pasos dentro de modal de detalles */
.route-steps

/* Fees Info - Secci贸n de comisiones en modal */
.fees-info

/* SECCIN ELIMINADA: summary-row, route-warning, info-banner, info-banner.success (no usadas) */

.card-header h3

/* @keyframes pulseGlow - DEFINIDO EN SECCIN DE ANIMACIONES CONSOLIDADAS */

.card-body

/* SECCIN ELIMINADA: fees-row, net-profit, source-row, source-value (no usadas) */

.fee-value

/* ==========================================
   ESTILOS PARA CARDS DE EXCHANGES (Reducido)
   ELIMINADOS: usdt-card, broker-card, binance-card, usdt-name, usdt-prices,
   broker-prices, binance-prices, usdt-grid, brokers-grid, binance-grid
   (no usados en templates actuales)
   ========================================== */

.broker-name

/* SECCIN ELIMINADA: Estilos para logos y detalles de bancos
   Clases eliminadas: bank-header, bank-logo-container, bank-logo, bank-spread,
   bank-source, bank-prices legacy, bank-price, bank-price-label, bank-price-value,
   bank-price-alt (no usadas en templates actuales) */

/* SECCIN ELIMINADA: UI compacta para bancos v5.0.23
   Clases eliminadas: bank-card.compact, bank-header-compact, bank-source-compact,
   bank-prices-compact, bank-price-compact, price-alt, bank-spread-compact,
   best-bank-highlight, bestBankGlow, best-bank-header, best-bank-icon, best-bank-title,
   best-bank-content, best-bank-name, best-bank-price, best-bank-source
   (no usadas en templates actuales) */

/* Las clases .price-label y .price-value S se usan: */
.price-label

/* Clases legacy de gu铆a eliminadas: .step-container, .step-item, .step-timeline-connector,
   .step-icon-wrapper, .step-icon, .step-number-badge, .step-content-card, .step-details-grid,
   .detail-item, .detail-content, .detail-label, .detail-value, .step-warning, .step-action,
   .action-link (no se usan en templates actuales) */
.calc-value

/* Botones de filtro de operaci贸n (crypto tab) */
.filter-btn-operation

/* @keyframes pulse - DEFINIDO EN SECCIN DE ANIMACIONES CONSOLIDADAS */

.warning-banner.stale-data

/* SECCIN ELIMINADA: filter-range, filter-toggle, filter-checkbox (no usadas en templates)
   Las clases filter-range-container, filter-range, filter-range-value, filter-toggle-label,
   filter-toggle-label:hover, filter-checkbox, filter-toggle-text, filter-toggle-icon 
   no est谩n siendo usadas en popup.js, popup.html ni renderHelpers.js */

/* ============================================
   COMPONENTES DE RUTA (Reducido v5.0.75)
   NOTA: .route-header, .route-info, .route-details, .p2p-badge - DEFINIDOS EN SECCIN CARDS L965+
   ============================================ */

/* ============================================
   ESTADO SIN RUTAS
   ============================================ */
.no-routes

/* @keyframes panelSlideDown - Usar slideDown (DEFINIDO EN SECCIN DE ANIMACIONES CONSOLIDADAS) */

.filters-panel-header

rules.declarations:
background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.1) 0%, rgba(109, 40, 217, 0.15) 100%);
  border: 1px solid rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.2);

rules.selector:
/* Contenedor de contenido de tabs de bancos */
.banks-tab-content

/* Variantes espec铆ficas de profit para crypto */
.crypto-route-card.profit-high::before

/* Elementos con peso visual extra fuerte */
.weight-bold

/* ==========================================
   MODAL DE DETALLES CRYPTO v8.0
   Dise帽o profesional y claro
   ========================================== */

.crypto-details-modal

rules.declarations:
background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(63, 185, 80, 0.1) 0%, var(--color-bg-tertiary) 100%);
  border-color: rgba(63, 185, 80, 0.3);

background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(248, 81, 73, 0.1) 0%, var(--color-bg-tertiary) 100%);
  border-color: rgba(248, 81, 73, 0.3);

padding: var(--space-3) var(--space-4);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border-subtle);

rules.fullRule:
/* Grid gap X/Y utilities */
.gap-x-0 { column-gap: var(--space-0); }

/* Margin X/Y utilities */
.mx-0 { margin-left: var(--space-0); margin-right: var(--space-0); }

/* Padding X/Y utilities */
.px-0 { padding-left: var(--space-0); padding-right: var(--space-0); }

/* Inset utilities (top, right, bottom, left) */
.inset-0 { top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; }

rules.declarations: top: auto; right: auto; bottom: auto; left: auto;
rules.fullRule: .inset-auto { top: auto; right: auto; bottom: auto; left: auto; }

/* Rounded corners for specific sides */
.rounded-t-sm { border-top-left-radius: var(--radius-sm); border-top-right-radius: var(--radius-sm); }

rules.declarations: transition: color var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-default), background-color var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-default), border-color var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-default);
rules.fullRule: .transition-colors { transition: color var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-default), background-color var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-default), border-color var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-default); }

rules.selector:
/* Mantener skeleton visible pero sin animaci贸n */
  .skeleton

/* Stagger Children - Animaci贸n escalonada para hijos */
.stagger-children > *

rules.declarations: animation: fadeInUp var(--duration-normal, 250ms) var(--ease-out-expo, cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1)) both;
animation: fadeInScale var(--duration-normal, 250ms) var(--ease-spring, cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1)) both;
animation: slideInRight var(--duration-normal, 250ms) var(--ease-out-expo, cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1)) both;
animation: slideInLeft var(--duration-normal, 250ms) var(--ease-out-expo, cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1)) both;
animation: countUp var(--duration-normal, 250ms) var(--ease-out-expo, cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1)) both;

rules.selector:
/* ==========================================
   6. UTILIDADES DE PERFORMANCE
   ========================================== */

/* 
 * NOTA IMPORTANTE SOBRE will-change:
 * - Solo usar en elementos que REALMENTE se van a animar
 * - Aplicar justo antes de la animaci贸n y remover despu茅s
 * - El uso excesivo puede DEGRADAR el rendimiento
 * - Preferir aplicar via JavaScript antes de animaciones complejas
 */

/* will-change para optimizar animaciones de transform */
.will-change-transform

/* will-change para animaciones que combinan transform y opacity */
.will-change-transform-opacity

/* will-change para scroll suave (solo cuando sea necesario) */
.will-change-scroll

/* Clase para remover will-change despu茅s de la animaci贸n */
.will-change-auto

/* GPU Acceleration helper - usar con cuidado */
.gpu-accelerated

/* Contain para mejorar performance de repaint */
.contain-layout

rules.declarations:
position: relative;
  transition: transform var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out-expo);

transition: transform var(--duration-fast, 150ms) var(--ease-out, cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)),
              box-shadow var(--duration-fast, 150ms) var(--ease-out, cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1));

rules.selector:
/* Hover Glow Success - Para elementos de ganancia */
.hover-glow-success:hover

/* Hover Glow Danger - Para elementos de p茅rdida */
.hover-glow-danger:hover

rules.declarations:
display: inline-block;
  animation: numberBounce 0.3s var(--ease-out-back, cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1));
animation: tooltipAppear var(--duration-fast, 150ms) var(--ease-out, cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)) both;

rules.selector:
/* Animaci贸n pulse infinita para el status dot */
.status-dot::before

rules.declarations:
background: var(--color-warning);
  animation: statusPulse 1s ease-in-out infinite;

rules.selector:
/* Staggered entrance para elementos del header */
.header-brand
rules.declarations:
animation: fadeInUp var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out-expo) both;
  animation-delay: 100ms;

animation: fadeInUp var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out-expo) both;
  animation-delay: 150ms;

animation: fadeInUp var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out-expo) both;
  animation-delay: 200ms;

transform: translateY(-2px);
  transition: transform var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out);

transform: scale(1.02);
  transition: transform var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-out);

rules.selector:
/* Efecto de glow en status dot */
.header-status:hover .status-dot::before
rules.declarations:
animation: statusPulse 1s ease-in-out infinite;
  transform: scale(2);

rules.selector:
/* Estado best: glow verde + badge destacado */
.exchange-card[data-best="true"]::before

/* Animaci贸n de conteo para n煤meros */
.price-value.counting

rules.declarations:
display: none;
  animation: fadeInUp var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-out-expo);
display: none; /* Ocultar label en m贸viles peque帽os */
